<title level="2" right="Creature 20">[The Knurly Witch](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2356)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Hag" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=84" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 453</row>

**Perception** +38; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +35, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +34, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +37, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +34, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +36, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +35, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +38

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +7

**Con** +6

**Int** +2

**Wis** +10

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Items**
[religious symbol of Gyronna](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41), [Wand of Slaying](/Equipment.aspx?ID=371) (7th)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 45 

**Fort** +32 

**Ref** +35 

**Will** +38 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic, resolve
</row>

**HP** 324

**Resistances**
physical 20 (except bludgeoning)

**Resolve** When the Knurly Witch rolls a success at a Will save, she gets a critical success instead.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +37 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [cold iron](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 4d10+14 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Divine Prepared Spells** DC 44, attack +38
- **Cantrips (10th)**
[Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266)
- **2nd**
[Death Knell](/Spells.aspx?ID=63), [Ghoulish Cravings](/Spells.aspx?ID=134), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Zone of Truth](/Spells.aspx?ID=379)
- **4th**
[Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6), [Discern Lies](/Spells.aspx?ID=74), [Outcast's Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=211)
- **5th**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Sending](/Spells.aspx?ID=272), [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)
- **6th**
[Blade Barrier](/Spells.aspx?ID=24), [Feeblemind](/Spells.aspx?ID=112), [Paranoia](/Spells.aspx?ID=214)
- **7th**
[Divine Decree](/Spells.aspx?ID=82), [Regenerate](/Spells.aspx?ID=248), [Divine Wrath](/Spells.aspx?ID=86)
- **8th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Flame Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=120), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)
- **9th**
[Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Massacre](/Spells.aspx?ID=186), [Telepathic Demand](/Spells.aspx?ID=336)
- **10th**
[Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (×7), [Summon Plant or Fungus](/Spells.aspx?ID=325)

**Cleric Domain Spells 2 focus points,** DC 44
- **10th**
[Savor the Sting](/Spells.aspx?ID=449), [Retributive Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=447)

**Rituals** DC 44

- **4th**
[Blight](/Rituals.aspx?ID=4)
- **7th**
[Word of Recall](/Rituals.aspx?ID=41)

**Divine Font**   [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Bonds of Iron** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15), [Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) Once per day, an annis hag can cause a cage built of cold iron fingernails to spring out of nothingness at a range of up to 30 feet, attempting an Athletics check to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) against the target's Fortitude DC; if the target has a weakness to cold iron, the annis hag gains a +2 circumstance bonus to this check. Unlike a normal Grapple, the annis hag doesn't need to be within reach and can move as she pleases, and a successful attempt lasts until the creature escapes (DC 42), causing the cage to crumble into rust. Any creature can attempt to destroy the cage by attacking it. It has an AC of 40, Hardness 20, and 80 Hit Points.

**Change Shape** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The hag can take on the appearance of any Medium female humanoid. This doesn't change her Speed or her attack and damage bonuses with her Strikes but might change the damage type her Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning).

**[Rend](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=30)** <actions string="Single Action" />  claw

**Word of Recall**   The Knurly Witch has used word of recall to bind herself to the House at the Edge of Time (area K16).

</column>
